Detailed Description

Web Extension of XHTMLSitePage. It includes a BDDConnection for configuration loading.

This class

Referenced by OnLoad().

WebSitePage::OnLoad (   ) 
 

callback function to be called by Application on ApplicationStart. Initializes the page with an XHTMLPageTemplate.

Then try to load configuration variables for site and server.

DB_ARRAY_INDEX must be set. MYSQL_CONF_BASE must be set. SITE_SESSIONS_ACTIVATED must be set. IDSITE must be set. Application->GetVariables[ DB_ARRAY_INDEX ] must be set.

See also:
Application class

Reimplemented from XHTMLSitePage.

Definition at line 108 of file WebSitePage.php.

References AbstractSitePage::GetApplication(), GetConfigurationDatabaseConnection(), Session::GetInstance(), XHTMLSitePage::GetTemplate(), initializeDatabasesConnections(), and TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_DATA.

WebSitePage::OnUnLoad (  $  applicationVars  ) 
 

callback function to be called by Application on ApplicationEnd. Sets up Execution time from Tag named TAG_EXECUTION_TIME and flushes the page.

Parameters:
$applicationVars arguments passed by Application on function call - see Application class
See also:
Application class

Reimplemented from XHTMLSitePage.

Definition at line 191 of file WebSitePage.php.

WebSitePage::Process (   ) 
 

Function called after OnLoad and before OnUnLoad. Here is all the process of the page.

Reimplemented from XHTMLSitePage.
